パッケージ texttemplate

クラス TextTemplate

java.lang.Object
texttemplate.TextTemplate
public class TextTemplate extends Object
Very simple text template class. - ${variable} - variables - #{comment} - comments - '\n', '\\', '\$' etc. - Backslash to escape preseeding charactors while '\n', '\r' and '\t' is treated as escape sequence.

  • コンストラクタの概要

    コンストラクタ
    コンストラクタ
    説明
    TextTemplate(String text)
    Creates template.

  • コンストラクタの詳細

    • TextTemplate

      public TextTemplate(String text)
      Creates template. This only prepares template engine and not compile it until it's necessary.
      パラメータ:
      text - Template text

  • メソッドの詳細

    • render

      public static String render(String text, String... values)
      Renders text with values interpolated. Each values are interpolated by ${0}, ${1} ... etc. according to its order to be given.
      パラメータ:
      text - Format text
      values - Values to interpolate
      戻り値:
      Result of evaluation

    • isCompiled

      public boolean isCompiled()
      Returns the template is already compiled or not.
      戻り値:
      True if it's compiled

    • compile

      public void compile()
      Compiles template. Usually it's not necessary to call this directly because the template itself will defer compilation until it's necessary. The compilation will occur only once per template and it has no effect to call this method multiple times on the same tempalte.

    • evaluate

      public String evaluate()
      Evaluate template. Use evaluate() method to pass values which will be interpolated. All the interpolation values become empty string because they are not found as no env provided.
      戻り値:
      Result text of evaluation

    • evaluate

      public String evaluate(Map<String,String> env)
      Evaluate template in given environment. Environment is a map from keys to interpolation values. When a key is not found in the given env, its value will be an empty string.
      パラメータ:
      env - Map from key to value (both String)
      戻り値:
      Result of evaluation
